100 rem  find x value which stops extra irq
110 cb = 819
120 for i = 0 to 188
130 read a
140 poke cb+i,a
150 next
160 for i = 0 to 4: read bd(i): next
170 for i = 0 to 4: read ct(i):next
180 sys cb
190 open 2,2,0,chr$(26)+chr$(7)
200 for j = 0 to 1
210 for i = 0 to 4
220 poke 64771, (ct(i) + 16)
230 x = 0
240 x = x +1 : poke 916, x
250 poke 64770, 7
260 sys 947
270 t3 = peek(1009)*256 + peek(1008)
280 if ((t3 > 67) and (x < 239)) then goto 240
290 print bd(i),t3,x
300 next i
310 sys 997
320 next j
330 close 2
340 sys 844
350 data 32,219,3,186,202,189,0,1
360 data 24,105,37,141,20,3,232,189
